title: Feed page UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed feed/page
AND user played games and has results
custom_steps: WHEN user views the Feed page
custom_expected:
THEN user is displayed with

* header 'Feed'
* divider line
* user's or user's friend avatar (with an outline color on the top left corner)
* 'You' or friends name (on the right side of the avatar)
* date of the result in m/d format (on the top right corner)
* game results/badge/trophy/reward pack (separate TC)

title: Avatar /You
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on the device
AND user is logged in
AND user played games and received rewards
AND user is on the Feed page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's profile page is open 
AND Profile is highlighted in the nav bar
AND no back arrow is displayed on the top left corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the 'You' bubble
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's profile page is open 
AND Profile is highlighted in the nav bar
AND no back arrow is displayed on the top left corner

title: Empty State (archived)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged 
AND user did not play any game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the Feed tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with an empty state

* title 'Results'
* copy 'You don't have any results yet - play a game and your results will start showing up here.'

title: EC - 0 XP/tokens
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on the device
AND is user logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user played the game but did not receive XP or tokens
custom_expected: THEN user should see 0 for XP or tokens

title: Feed Toggle
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to the Feed tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with the Feed toggle
(Feed / My Activity)
AND the Feed is always defaulted

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the title text says 'Feed'
AND user sees everyone's activity (friends and own)
AND records are limited to 2 weeks or max 500 records

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user navigates to 'My Activity'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the title text says 'My Activity'
AND user sees own activities only
AND records are limited to 2 weeks or max 500 records

title: Friend Activity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user has friends

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's friend got contest scored event,   BADGE, TROPHY or REWARD PACK
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees the friend's results in the Feed
AND user sees the contest scored event without XP and Tokens showing
AND user's own activity should be displayed in the Feed view

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the feed page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN friend's activity and user's activity should be displayed in chronological order together (event creation time, not action time)
AND The list of friends to display and their activity should be reloaded every time the Feed page is reloaded
AND the time span of all activity should be 14 days up to the last 500 records

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN clicking on the Badge
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the badge modal is open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN clicking on the Trophy
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the trophy modal is open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN clicking on contest score event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN corresponding game is open

title: Feed event reactions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user has friends
AND user's friends have activity in the Feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the friends activity
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the emote (heart shape) at the bottom right corner of activity section

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the emote
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN tooltip menu is open with like, laugh, wow, cry options

title: Reaction Modal
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user receives a reaction 
AND taps on the reaction count
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be able to call upon a slide-up modal with a tab viewed of different reactions made and a list of all users who made those reactions

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the modal
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with 
* 'Reactions' title
* exit icon on the top right corner
* All count and separate count of all 4 reactions (like, laugh, wow, cry) AND blue underline when user navigates between the reaction tabs
* Users avatar, outline, username and level
* user's reaction on the top right corner of avatar

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13374703)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user does not have all kind of reactions
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN only reactions received are displayed 
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13374702)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on like OR laugh OR wow OR cry reactions
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN people who gave this specific reaction are displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on exit icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user slides up
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the modal is displayed fully and user can scroll through the list of people who gave the reaction

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the  username or avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN modal should be closed and user's profile should be open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back arrow
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the Feed page with the reaction modal open

title: Reaction Display
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the feed event reactions
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN Emotes should always be displayed in this order when available: like, laugh, wow, cry

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has just one reaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN show that single emote

(if user got just a cry reaction that only cry emote will be displayed)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user received a second reaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN 2 emotes are displayed 
AND the order is correct (step 1)
(if user received like, then like is displayed first and then cry - laugh and wow are missing)

title: Feed event - no reactions received
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user has activity

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has no reaction to their activity
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the reaction elements and horizontal divider should not be displayed
AND the vertical space of the bottom area of the event is reduced

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user receives a first reaction to this event
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN given reaction and divider line is displayed
AND the vertical space is increased

title: Other User Profile Interactivity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the friends name or avatar in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is brought to user's profile page
AND the Feed should be the highlighted nav bar item when going to another user’s Profile page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the back arrow button (iOS) AND X icon (Android)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is brought back to the feed

title: Receiving reaction flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN receives a reaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user receives a notification that appears in both the Feed and My Activity
AND user should be able to see what the event that the reaction is for
AND reaction notifications are only visible to me 
AND reaction notifications are not react-able themselves. 

![](index.php?/attachments/get/13373618)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN only one person react
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the word 'results' is singular

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN several people reacted
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the word 'results' is plural

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is already a reaction notification event and that same event gets another reaction
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN that event is updated and brought to the top of the Feed/My Activity. 
AND the date should be updated to the latest reaction

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user goes to profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the count of received reaction increments by 1

title: Giving reaction flow / tooltip
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user has friends
AND user's friends have scored events in the Feed
custom_expected:
User should only be able to register a single emote per event
AND user can select/de-select emotes as many times as they want

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on emote and selects the like option
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the emote amount should increment by 1 
AND the like emote should be displayed instead of the clear heart on the bottom right corner
AND when user goes to friends profile, the emote should increment by 1 there as well

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on emote and selects the laugh option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the laugh emote option should replace the like emote

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on emote and selects the wow option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the wow emote option should replace the laugh emote

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on emote and selects the cry option
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the cry emote option should replace the wow emote

title: Removing reaction flow
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user has friends
AND user's friends have scored events in the Feed
AND user gave reaction for friends activity

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the emote that user gave to their friend
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN it will de-select the emote 
AND the emote amount decrements by 1
AND the total amount of emotes decrements by 1 in friends profile

title: Dismiss Emote Tooltip
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user has friends
AND user's friends have scored events in the Feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects an emote in the tooltip
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it selects the emote for the activity and dismisses the tooltip

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks outside of the tooltip
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN it dismisses the tooltip

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the emote tooltip is active
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not able to directly interact with another on-screen element

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user dismiss the tooltip
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to interact with another on-screen element

title: Giving reaction to your own activity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views their own activity in the Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user does not see the heart button
AND user can not react to their own activity

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views their own activity in the 'My Activity' tab in the Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user does not see the heart button
AND user can not react to their own activity

title: Feed tab - empty state (Feed)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab (Feed)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has no activities for at least 14 days AND user has no friends OR has friends who has no activity for at least 14 days 
AND user is on the Feed tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the feed tab should show an empty state

Things to be displayed
* copy 'MLB Play is more fun when you play against your friends!'
* 'Invite Friends' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on CTA button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the share sheet with Friend Link should be open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user OR user's friend has a first event in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN feed tab displays that feed and no empty state is displayed

title: Feed tab - empty state (My Activity) - 0 XP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab (My Activity)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has no activities for the season
AND user has 0 XP
AND user is on the Feed tab (My Activity)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the feed tab should show an empty state

Things to be displayed
* copy 'Come back here to see your accomplishments as you start playing and winning games!'
* 'Choose a game for me' CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on CTA button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Beat the Streak game should be open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a first event in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN feed tab displays that feed and no empty state is displayed

title: Feed tab - empty state (My Activity) > 0 XP
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab (My Activity)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has no activities for at least 14 days 
AND user is on the Feed tab (My Activity)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the feed tab should show an empty state

Things to be displayed
* copy 'It’s been a while since you played a game. Get back to earning rewards today!'
* 'Choose a game for me' CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on CTA button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Beat the Streak game should be open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a first event in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN feed tab displays that feed and no empty state is displayed

title: EC - Feed after user deletes a friend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user deletes friend
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN those user's event activities are not displayed in the Feed

title: EC - Reaction count after user deletes a friend
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user deletes friend who gave the user reaction to their event
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the count of reactions does not change

title: Pull to Refresh Feed/My Activity
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
custom_steps: WHEN user pulls down on the Feed screen and releases
custom_expected: THEN it refreshes the view (user events + reactions received)

title: EC - smooth scroll
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls the feed page
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to scroll smoothly and no issue with data load happens

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls through friends reaction in modal (lots of reactions
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to scroll smoothly and no issue with data load happens

title: Single vs multiple result
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user received one or multiple reaction
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the results copy should always say 'result'

title: Reactions Count
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is on the Feed tab
AND user received reactions
custom_steps: WHEN user views the reaction count on the feed page AND on reaction modal
custom_expected:
THEN the numbers for social stats should be formatted: ###.#M (3 digits, then 1 significant digit after, then the notation, if applicable when greater than 999)
AND at .5K we should round up, otherwise round down
AND the K should be capitalized

title: BTS - Contest Results card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played Beat the Streak

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Beat the Streak in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble
* date (top right corner)
* 'Beat the Streak' logo
* result copy
* players that user picked
* amount of XP and tokens user earned

title: Quick Pick - Contest Results card - ARCHIEVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Predict app installed on device
AND User is logged in
AND user played Quick Pick

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Quick Pick in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble
* date (top right corner)
* 'Quick Pick' logo
* 'You got * out of 7 questions right (note, it will always be 7 questions max)
* amount of XP and tokens user earned

title: Diamond Derby - Contest Results card - ARCHIEVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Predict app installed on device
AND User is logged in
AND user played Diamond Derby

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Diamond Derby in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble
* date (top right corner)
* 'Diamond Derby' logo
* feed copy (separate TC)
* amount of XP and tokens user earned

title: Diamond Derby - Contest Scored Feed Copy - ARCHIEVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user MLB Predict app installed on device
AND User is logged in
AND user played Diamond Derby
custom_steps: WHEN user views the results of Diamond Derby in the Results Feed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user had no correct picks and did not strike out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You did not get any correct picks so you remain at [base]'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user had no correct picks and struck out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You did not get any picks and struck out'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were not scored and did not strike out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You got # correct picks, advancing to [base]'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were scored and did not strike out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You got # correct picks, scoring # runs and advancing to [base]'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were scored and struck out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You got # correct picks, scoring # runs and struck out'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's runs were not scored and struck out
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the copy should say 'You got # correct picks and struck out'

title: BTS Game - Game scenarios - feed copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is on Results feed 

Note: All BTS game card scenario can be tested for the suffice testing using postman. (Please reach out to Sam Allen if need help with set up)

custom_steps_separated.content: One pick, one hit
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Your Streak is now [current streak] (+1)
[player1] got a hit!

custom_steps_separated.content: Two picks, two hits
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Your Streak is now [current streak] (+2)
[player1] and [player 2] both got a hit!

custom_steps_separated.content: One pick, no hit
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Your Streak ended
[player_who_broke_streak] didn’t get a hit

custom_steps_separated.content: Two picks, one hit
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Your Streak ended
[Player who got hit] got a hit, but [Player who did not get a hit] did not

custom_steps_separated.content: Two picks, no hit
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Your Streak ended
[Player who did not get a hit] nor [Player who did not get a hit] got a hit

title: Base Chase - Contest Results card - ARCHIEVE
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played Base Chase

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of Base Chase in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble
* date 
* copy 'Your Base Chase team earned # total bases'
* 'Base Chase' logo
* amount of XP and tokens user earned

title: By the Numbers - Contest Scored copy
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device
AND user is logged in
AND user played By the Numbers

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the results of By the Numbers in the Results Feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* user's avatar
* 'You' bubble
* date 
* By the Numbers game logo
* copy '[You/username] scored # points in By The Numbers 
* If the user only earned 1 point then the copy should read: [You/username] scored 1 point in By The Numbers
* AND amount of XP and tokens earned

title: Reward Pack card
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged in 
AND user played games
AND user got a Reward Pack
AND user is on the Results feed/page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Reward Pack
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* copy 'You earned a Reward Pack!'
* copy 'Here are the items you received:'
* 3 reward images 
* Reward type (Avatar, Wallpaper) 
* Rarity (Common, rare, epic, legendary)

AND the items in Reward Pack awarded randomly
AND there should not be same kind rewards (3 wallpapers or 3 avatars)
AND same avatars or wallpaper should not be rewarded in one Reward Pack

title: Virtual Rewards details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on the device
AND the user is logged in
AND the user played games and received rewards pack
AND the user is on the Results page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on rewarded avatar
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Avatar customization page in Profile should be open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Set as Your Avatar' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's Avatar is updated
AND modal is closed and user is brought up to Results page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'X' icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN modal is closed and user is brought up to Results page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on rewarded wallpaper
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Wallpaper customization page in Profile should be open

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Set as Your Wallpaper' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's Wallpaper is updated
AND modal is closed and user is brought up to Results page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'X' icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN modal is closed and user is brought up to Results page

title: Legendary Reward Pack for users who had a Perfect Game in Diamond Derby
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND User logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user played the Diamond Derby contest 
AND user got a Perfect Game

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user got a Perfect Game
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user gets awarded with Diamond Derby badge with the Legendary Rewards Pack

AND user can award it as many times as they earned it

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Legendary Reward Pack
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is displayed with the copy: “You unlocked a Legendary Rewards Pack for your Diamond Derby submission on [submission date]”

title: Trophy in Feed
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is Logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN user play BTS or QP contest 
AND earned the TROPHY

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on RESULTS page AND earned Trophy
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should display with all results (user events) include Trophy 

Display on Results tab for Trophy: 

You earned the NAME trophy! Date 
Trophy image

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on  earned Trophy
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be taken to detail page of the Earned trophy 
Includes: 
* 'Trophies' Title 
* X icon on the top right corner
* Trophy's image
* Trophy's Name in Bold letter 
* Trophy's short description in regular font by design

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tap on X icon
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should be taken back to RESULTS page

title: Hall of Farmer
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on Device
AND user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user earned >40000 XP

title: “Perfect Game: Quick Pick” badge / Legendary Virtual Reward Pack
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on the device
AND the user is logged in
AND the user played QP
AND the user got all answers correct
AND the user navigates to Results page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user successfully answers all 7 questions in a single QP contest correctly
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user receives a badge “Perfect Game: Quick Pick"

* You earned the Perfect Game: QP badge for your Quick Pick submission on [submission date

AND the badge would be in addition to the XP and RP the user would normally earn for playing QP and getting 7 questions correct.

AND user receives “Legendary Rewards Pack” (internal description: Pack of 3 Legendary virtual rewards)
AND the prize should not include any duplicates of Legendary assets that the user already has.
AND the prize should be in addition to any other reward that the user gets. E.g., If user answers all 7 Quick Pick questions correctly and that also puts user over the Token threshold for the next reward, user should be awarded both the Reward pack that user earned through that mechanism as well as the Legendary reward pack that user earned by achieving this.

title: Prize Feed Event
custom_preconds:
GIVEN MLB Play app installed on device 
AND user is logged in 
AND user played games
AND user got a Reward Pack
AND user is on the Results feed/page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Prize in the feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user should be displayed with

* Title: You Earned a Prize
* Copy: Your [Badge/Tokens] unlocked [Prize Name]. You can redeem this Prize by going to the Prizes screen on the Profile Tab.
* Prize Image

AND Prize event should only be seen for user and not the friends
AND it should be displayed in both Feed and My Activity
AND it should be read-only (not clickable)
AND user is not able  to give reactions to it
